actions.description: The egg hunter makes two Egg Tooth attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 17 (4d6 + 3) piercing damage if the target is an object.
actions.name: Egg Tooth

specialTraits.description: The egg hunter can breathe air and water.
specialTraits.name: Amphibious
